messages.message: Incompatible KTXmetalPixelFormat and VkFormat. If KTXmetalPixelFormat is present vkFormat must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED.
messages.details: vkFormat is VK_FORMAT_ASTC_4x4_UNORM_BLOCK but it must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED if KTXmetalPixelFormat is present.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
